javadoc.text: * Interface representing a univariate real interpolating function.
* Compute an interpolating function for the dataset.
javadoc.param: xval Arguments for the interpolation points.
yval Values for the interpolation points.
javadoc.return: a function which interpolates the dataset.
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentExceptionif the arguments violate assumptions made by the interpolation * algorithm.
DimensionMismatchException if arrays lengthes do not match
